content: Investments Insurance Family Asked by Ryan LeeAsked 4w agoCan anyone advise if Hong Leong family protect360 is good?Would like to know about the pros and cons of this product and whether it will be suitable for my family.1 answerAnswerBump0

Loh Tat Tian, 2nd Hand Insurance Broker / EX-FA at Singapore Insurance Value FindingLevel 6. MasterUpdated 4w agoFirst, check out a few things(1) https://ww2.hlas.com.sg/wp-content/uploads/2018/12/FAMILY-PROTECT360-Exclusion-List.pdf Exclusions. Would they be a concern for you?(2) Coverage: What is the purpose of buying this plan for? What benefits are you looking at?(3) https://ww2.hlas.com.sg/approved-clinics/ is the approved clinic the one you frequently go to?(4) https://ww2.hlas.com.sg/personalinsurance/personalaccident/familyprotect360/ read the general terms and conditions attached to it.(5) have you done a comparison with other PAs?0 comments0
